title: WSB's Weekend Bite: Alpha Picks Just Made Investing Easier!
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description:
This week we're joined by Seeking Alpha's Head of Quantitative, Steven Cress. We dive in with Steve about what Alpha Picks by Seeking Alpha is, and how his team designed the product to make investing easier for all investors.

Want to learn more about Alpha Picks? Just click here -> bit.ly/3K2unS3`
